strings.Value: "Now the rulers of all the neighboring lands will have to sit up and take note. Your power grows, {name}. And with it — new opportunities open before you..."
"Power whispers and tempts. One who listens for too long becomes its slave."
"Power is merely a tool. What matters is how you use it."
"If you want to see a few of these opportunities, come with me to a brothel in the capital, ha ha hmmm... Hey, wait — did Jaethal mean they'll be giving us top-class service abroad too?"
